title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 70.3 - Eligibility for program assistance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 70.3 - Eligibility for program assistance

State Regulations
(a) The department may provide, within available appropriations, program assistance
to an applicant which employs less than 500 workers or had gross annual sales
of less than $10 million during the last fiscal year. (b) In order to receive program assistance, an applicant must demonstrate that its proposed project was not commenced prior
to the date of application to the department for program assistance. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes

70.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
